about_the_game:
■Naru-Morph!
This is a tale of a hero summoned to oppose the nefarious demonlord, a warrior slaying dragons, a knight protecting the powerless...
...or not!
Play as Naru who is suddenly summoned to a different world by an angel who ,mistaken for a girl due to his cute appearance, straight away discards him into the abyss.

Swearing his revenge strongly, Naru begins his journey to the heavens to "slap some senses into that brat!"

■Adventure the world utilizing morphs!
"Narumofu!" is a 2D exploration fluff packed action-adventure game. Acquire the power of Beastfolks you encounter on your journey, make use of your morphs abilities to explore new lands and to mighty foes!

■Conquer unique bosses who use various attacks!!
Bosses encountered during adventures all require different methods to defeat. Watch for the indicators of their attacks, study their patterns, use chants as to devise strategies, and utilize morphs and items to gain the upper hand in battles.
